engine.components

Class CollisionComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.core.entity.EntityComponent
      • engine.components.CollisionComponent

  • public class CollisionComponent
extends EntityComponent
    Component that detects collision between two entities. Note that this component requires that both entities have a ColliderComponent. Should one entity not have a ColliderComponent, then no collisions will be detected, because there is no collider to detect collisions against.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • resolveCollisions

        public DoublePair resolveCollisions(double amtX,
                           double amtY)
        Resolves collisions with any other CollisionComponents encountered.
        Parameters:
        amtX - The amount attempting to be moved on X.
        amtY - The amount attempting to be moved on Y.
        Returns:
        New amtX and amtY that will not cause collisions after movement.
